PIPPIN

Influenced by an early life of journalism and photography, the software I enjoy building is a mixture of interfaces that experiment, and interfaces that teach. I’m most interested in work that allows me to ask questions of the overlap between art and science. I’ll always be a child of the open web. The work here is a sample of both professional and hobby projects. If curious you can read more about me, why I write software, and how.
